java.rmi.Remote, TestListenerFactory, XmlListenerFactory, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.MessageKeys, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.RemoteTagsComponent, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Diagnostics, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Liveness, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Prim, org.smartfrog.sfcore.prim.Update, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.RemoteReferenceResolverHelper
public class XmlListenerComponent
extends AbstractXmlListenerComponent
implements XmlListenerFactory

This is a listener of tests Implement the XmlListenerFactory interface and so provide a component for XML logging. Note that we are only a factory; the listening is done by OneHostXMLListener
